title: ReplyWithHeader Mail Plugin/Bundle's Latest Changelog
description: Most recent changes with release notes and links to updates.

latest.title: v6.0 (1 new feature, 1 enhancements)
latest.releaseNotes:
v6.0 (1 new feature, 1 enhancements)
  • Added support for macOS Mojave Mail.app
  • Added RWH main menu and RWH preferences moved to Mail.app main menu

Please have a look Install-Instructions-Mojave-OS-and-Above.txt and follow the steps for Mojave OS

Spread the word of ReplyWithHeader (RWH)

  • Providing "Star" on Github - https://github.com/jeevatkm/ReplyWithHeader
  • Softpedia.com - https://mac.softpedia.com/get/Internet-Utilities/ReplyWithHeaders.shtml
  • MacUpdate.com - https://www.macupdate.com/app/mac/49256/replywithheader
